channel.title: Registration required
channel.description:
Is there a way to make it required to register on my forums before the can login to my server. Project Insanity - source
i searched and found nothing but if there is please hook me up,
Thanks, FusionLord.

item.title: Registration required
item.dc:creator: @dhumiston dhumiston
item.description:
@dhumiston wrote:

  1. Dragon needs to learn grammer. It’s “You’re asking people”
  2. It’s through MYSQL. Make your server load up like the highscores do. After they register on the forums have it make a table for the username on forums and ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Registration required
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

  1. You asking people to spoonfeed you.
  2. you need a webclient to do that.

Read full topic
